objective: Reach 1600 resources. 5-cap grants 300 resources/sec for a near-instant win.

control_priority.early_game: Low - Pit location, hard to reinforce

opening.composition: 1 to Stables, 4 to Lumber Mill, 1-2 to Gold Mine (Stealth), rest to Blacksmith
opening.timing: Use Rocket Boots to reach Gold Mine faster than Horde
opening.critical_path: Stables -> Lumber Mill -> Blacksmith (The Western Triangle)

early_game.priority: Secure Blacksmith first, then Lumber Mill
early_game.movement: Use Rocket Boots for Gold Mine access

mid_game.aggressive: Attack enemy Farm if they have 4+ at Blacksmith

opening.composition: 1 to Farm, 1 to Lumber Mill (Slow Fall), rest to Blacksmith. Skip Gold Mine initially
opening.timing: Reach Blacksmith ~2 seconds faster than Alliance
opening.critical_path: Farm -> Lumber Mill -> Blacksmith (The Iron Triangle - Most efficient rotation)

early_game.priority: Secure Blacksmith first, then Lumber Mill
early_game.movement: Use Slow Fall from Lumber Mill to reinforce Blacksmith

mid_game.aggressive: Attack enemy Stables if they have 4+ at Blacksmith

Melee_Cleave_Comp.strategy: RUSH_BS_ZER - Ignore Mine/LM, send 13 to BS, 1 Farm/Stables
Melee_Cleave_Comp.reason: Force a team fight where melee dominance wins

the_iron_triangle.description: Holding Farm, Lumber Mill, and Blacksmith allows the fastest reinforcement times
tactics: Use Slow Fall/Parachute from Lumber Mill to reinforce BS or Farm instantly
Defenders at Lumber Mill act as 'scouts' with full vision of the valley
Maintain 1-2 defenders per base in triangle
Attack enemy home base when they're committed to triangle
the_iron_triangle.fallback: Fall back to 2-cap strategy if triangle breaks

dynamic_response: If 4+ enemies attack a node, defenders must 'spin the flag' (AoE) to prevent capping
If losing 3 bases, ignore Gold Mine; it is too deep in a pit to reinforce others quickly
Assault the enemy 'Home' base (Stables/Farm) to force them to peel off the Blacksmith
If enemy has 4+ at Blacksmith, send 3+ to contest immediately
If controlling 4+ bases, focus all efforts on maintaining 5-cap

defensive_stalling.logic: If outnumbered, prioritize 'Spinning' (preventing the 8-sec cap) over getting kills

ninja_capping.logic: Send 1 Stealth bot (Rogue/Druid) to an undefended enemy back-cap while the main zerg distracts
ninja_capping.trigger: Enemy team is fully committed to a central fight at Blacksmith AND enemy_defenders_at_home == 0
ninja_capping.backup: Send 1-2 additional bots if stealth cap successful

movement_optimization.water_walking: Shamans/DKs must use Water Walking/Path of Frost to cross the BS/ST/GM lake area

Alliance: Use ST-GM path for Gold Mine access
Horde: Use FM-GM path for Gold Mine access
General: Avoid center valley when possible, use edges

early_game.behavior: Focus on base control over resource farming

mid_game.behavior: Balance base control with resource accumulation

turtle_mode.behavior: DEFEND_ONLY - Do not attack new bases, risk nothing

team_size.1-2: Defensive capping, avoid fights, ninja cap undefended
team_size.3-4: Contest bases, engage favorable fights, coordinated capping
team_size.5+: Zerg bases, force fights, maintain 3+ cap advantage

close.strategy: Maximize base control, engage in fights

time_based.minutes_2-8: Establish base control, build resource lead
time_based.last_2_minutes: Secure win condition or comeback attempt
